message_1: A message "HELLO WORLD" is to be encrypted using Rail fence cipher technique with 3 rails. Encrypt the message and write the ciphertext.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail Fence cipher with 3 rails, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the ciphertext along the rows:

HOR ELWLD LO

So, the encrypted message is "HORELWLDLO".
